## SpliceStrategy.normalize() method

Normalizes the splices before delivery to array change subscribers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalize(previous: unknown[] | undefined, current: unknown[], changes: Splice[] | undefined): readonly Splice[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

previous


</td><td>

unknown\[\] \| undefined


</td><td>

The previous version of the array if a reset has taken place.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

current


</td><td>

unknown\[\]


</td><td>

The current version of the array.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

changes


</td><td>

[Splice](../fast-element.splice/)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined


</td><td>

The set of changes tracked against the array.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

readonly [Splice](../fast-element.splice/)<!-- -->\[\]
